inclusion.criterion: Internal mammary sentinel lymph node biopsy (IM-SLNB)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have received neoadjuvant therapy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a previous history of breast cancer
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
